wordpressPage.title: Contact
wordpressPage.content:
We prefer, to the extent that it is possible, that all inquiries are made ​​via e-mail.

CEO:
Tonje Kaada

PR manager and Klubbdagen coordinator:
Jonas Prangerød

Booking:
Booking

Marketing manager, Øyanatt coordinator:
Birgitte Mandelid

Sponsorship manager:
Cath Røsseland

Project Manager:
Erik Hauge Stangeby

CFO:
Thomas Andre Valnes

Food manager, Environmental manager:
Ingrid Kleiva Møller

Head of volunteers:
Anders Tangen

Booking manager + Øya International:
Claes Olsen

 

***

If you need to send us something by post, this is the only correct address:
Øyafestivalen
Torggt. 5
0181 Oslo
Norway

messages.blog.noresult: Could not find any posts for the current query
messages.errorboundary.desc: Please help us with reporting the error, so that we can attend to it. Thank you very much for your help!
messages.errorboundary.title: Sorry, something went wrong
messages.gallery.flicker: See all images from {year} on flickr
messages.newsletter.consentLabel: I agree to the terms and conditions
messages.newsletter.consentText:
Øyafestivalen sender ut nyhetsbrev cirka 3-4 ganger per måned via
    e-post. Make AS er databehandler for nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen
    lagres i en egen database, deles ikke med andre og slettes når du
    sier opp abonnementet ved å melde deg av via lenken nederst i
    nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen slettes også om vi får tilbakemelding
    om at den ikke er aktiv.
messages.newsletter.title: Newsletter signup
